body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Juan Thomas and the customer's name is Lauren Smith.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Juan Thomas, and I'm with Phat Hogs, your friendly motorcycle dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Juan, I'm Lauren Smith. I'm just feeling a bit overwhelmed with choosing the right motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Lauren. There are many options available. Can I start by asking you what type of riding you plan to do?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I mostly want it for weekend rides and some commuting.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds great! We have several models that might suit you. Before we dive in, could you please provide your email address so I can send over some options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Lauren. And one more thing, could you please provide your phone number for follow-up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three zero three, five six seven, eight nine zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for that information! Now, let's find you the bike that best fits your riding style.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Juan. I look forward to seeing the options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Lauren! Thank you for your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
